content.question: The energy stored in the capacitor was originally <math alttext="U" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>U</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>. After the dielectric is inserted, the energy stored in the capacitor is now

choices.label: <math alttext="the fraction U over kappa squared" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mstyle scriptlevel="+1"><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>U</mi></mrow><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>κ</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the fraction U over kappa" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mstyle scriptlevel="+1"><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>U</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>κ</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="the fraction U over kappa" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mstyle scriptlevel="+1"><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>U</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>κ</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.D: Predict new values or factors of change of physical quantities using functional dependence between variables.
